description: This joke humorously plays on the phrase 'to draw blood', using a red pen as a clever pun.
title: The Doctor's Red Pen
n_1: Dr. Smith holds a red pen, ready for his next patient.
n_2: Dr. Smith pretends to use the pen on a patient’s arm.
n_3: Nurse Jones realizes the joke and starts laughing.
n_4: Both share a light-hearted moment in the hospital.
c2_1: Do you need the syringe for the blood test?
c1_2: No, I’ll just draw blood with this!
c1_4: A little humor helps in medicine!
